text: was a Japanese movie director and screenwriter. He was known for directing and writing the cult-classic Godzilla vs. Hedorah. He was an executive producer on the Legendary Pictures's American Godzilla movies, Godzilla (2014) and Godzilla: King of the Monsters (2019). He was born in Imabari, Japan. Banno died of problems caused by a subarachnoid hemorrhage in Kawasaki, Japan on May 7, 2017 at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from subarachnoid hemorrhage Category:Japanese movie directors Category:Japanese screenwriters
title: Yoshimitsu Banno
